column4: Hi! For some strange reason when i login with ssh motd is displayed twice? Any ideas how to fix this?
if you make a file called .hushlogin it shouldent show at all.
could be your .bashrc or somthing is starting a second login shell
i mean i want it to be fixed to user login name is that possible?
thought thats how they normslly work. identd is simthing i find useless these days
